title: Sugar Crush: How to Reduce Inflammation, Reverse Nerve Damage
description:
Sugar Crush: How to Reduce Inflammation, Reverse Nerve Damage, and Reclaim Good Health by Richard Jacoby, Raquel Baldelomar

English | 2015 | ISBN: 0062348205 | 256 pages | EPUB | 1 MB

What Grain Brain did for wheat, this book by a leading peripheral nerve surgeon now does for sugar, revealing how it causes crippling nerve damage throughout the bodyÃ¢â‚¬â€in our feet, organs, and brainÃ¢â‚¬â€why sugar and carbohydrates are harmful to the body's nerves, and how eliminating them can mitigate and even reverse the damage.

Sugar Crush exposes the shocking truth about how a diet high in sugar, processed carbohydrates, and wheat compresses and damages the peripheral nerves of the body, leading to pain, numbness, and tingling in the hands and feet, along with a host of related conditions, including migraines, gall bladder disease, and diabetes.
